sentences.english: The police have seized a great deal of drugs this time.
sentences.chinese: 警方這次搜查緝獲了大量的毒品。

sentences.english: Untreated babies may become developmentally delayed, have seizures, or die.
sentences.chinese: 未經可能成爲發展遲緩兒，已緝獲，或死。

sentences.english: Within 24 hours, seizures and catatonia developed in the patient.
sentences.chinese: 在24小時內，緝獲和緊張症發達國家的病人。

sentences.english: The presumed additive effect of seizures has not been decisively clarified.
sentences.chinese: 推定的加性效應的緝獲沒有果斷澄清。

sentences.english: And did you know that flashing images have been known to induce seizures in some people.
sentences.chinese: 和你知道閃爍圖像已被稱爲誘導緝獲的一些人。

sentences.english: Police seized six homemade bombs and explosives from the house, Zaman said.
sentences.chinese: 警察從房屋內緝獲六枚自制的炸彈和炸藥，扎曼說。
